Detailed Description

A virtual class for print support with several platform-specific implementations.

This class has no public constructor: don't instantiate it; use Fl_Printer or Fl_PSfile_Device instead.

Member Function Documentation

Fl_Device* Fl_Abstract_Printer::set_current ( void   )  [virtual]

Sets this device (display, printer, local file) as the target of future graphics calls.

Returns:
The current target device of graphics calls.

Reimplemented from Fl_Device.
